data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Guo, Peng, Wang, Yuezhao (2011): A new genus and species of cryptic Asian green pitviper (Serpentes: Viperidae: Crotalinae) from southwest China. Zootaxa 2918: 1-14, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.203545
